events.message: I would like to request a refund for my recent order because the item does not meet my expectations and I want to return it.
The issue was classified as a refund request based on the customer's message indicating a return and money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to assist you with your refund request and ensure a smooth process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you wish to return the item so I can assist you further?
My order number is 123456789, and I want a refund because the product was not as described on the website and I’m quite disappointed.
Thank you for the details. I’ve initiated the refund process, and you will receive an email with the return instructions shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and for starting the refund process. I appreciate your help resolving this matter.
The refund case has now been resolved successfully. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just following up to ensure your refund was processed to your satisfaction and ask if you have any other concerns.
Since there are no further questions, the refund case is now officially closed. Thank you for contacting customer support.
